name: SimpleExcel.php
tagline: Easily parse / convert / write any Microsoft Excel XML / CSV / TSV / HTML / JSON / etc formats
body:
## Features

* Available parsers: Microsoft Excel 2003 XML, CSV, TSV, HTML, JSON
* Available writers: Microsoft Excel 2003 XML, CSV, TSV, HTML, JSON

## Dependencies

PHP >= 5.3

## Installation

Just load this library in your PHP project by including SimpleExcel.php

```php
require_once('../your/project/directory/here/lib/SimpleExcel/SimpleExcel.php');
```

Or, if you're using Composer to manage libraries for your PHP project, just include [this package](https://packagist.org/packages/faisalman/simple-excel-php) in composer.json

```js
"require": {
    "faisalman/simple-excel-php": "0.3.*"
}
```

## Usage Example

### Prior to version 0.4:

```php
use SimpleExcel\SimpleExcel

$excel = new SimpleExcel('CSV');
$excel->parser->loadFile('test.csv'); // load file

echo $excel->parser->getCell(1, 1); // print

$excel->convertTo('JSON');
$excel->writer->addRow(array('add', 'another', 'row')); // insert more record
$excel->writer->saveFile('example'); // save as file
```

### New API

```php
use SimpleExcel\SimpleExcel

$excel = new SimpleExcel();
$excel->loadFile('test.csv', 'CSV'); // load file

print_r($excel->getWorksheet(1)->getCell(1, 1)); // print

$excel->getWorksheet(1)->insertRecord(array('add', 'another', 'row')); // insert more record
$excel->exportFile('/home/faisalman/Downloads/saved.json', 'JSON'); // save as file
```
